website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Aspire E1-510P-2671 offers a touch-capable budget laptop with great battery life that won't leave you broke.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Received this laptop today, plug and play straight from the box. As always with Acer, fantastic quality/price ratio! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Francois

customer_reviews.title: Luv it
customer_reviews.text: Laptop according to specs really happy with performance for home use !! Would highly recommend it as very good price vs performance
customer_reviews.author: DorianneFrendo

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for menopausal women, it will test your patience.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this laptop now. I don't know if its just Windows 8.1, but I get easily annoyed at the constant screen change, side tabs appearing on desktop, and screen zoom out. If there is a way I can stop this please can someone let me know. Oh yes, and the beeping for CAPS ON & OFF, bring back the little light on a button to inform me of these tasks. If this is the new style of Microsoft windows stuff, then Im not an happy bunny, bring back Windows 7 or vista, much preferred. Why do these businesses try to 'fix' something when its not broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good low cost laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Works well right out of the box. ACER supply some silly utilities and the usual pre installed security software but the rest of it is fine. Its a Which recommendation for low cost laptop and it meets expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy James

customer_reviews.title: Quite good
customer_reviews.text: In general pleased with this computer, it was good value for what you get. I like the keyboard although my touchpad mouse has stopped working since I downloaded Windows 10. I can't get it working again and so I had to buy an external mouse to use. Possibly the fault of the software download but I had to take a star off for this problem.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Really good laptop, great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Really good laptop, great value for money. Only one fly in the ointment: windows 8.1! However, one quick download from www.classicshell.com and I can make it look (and work) like XP or Windows 7. So in summary: Laptop: Great Operating system: Crap, but fixable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: ) Its great to have every thing moving so fast
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying using my new laptop, only the second one I've ever owned,( my first one lasted 8 years.) Its great to have every thing moving so fast. Its taking a while to understand windows 8, that's normal. The sound quality isn't that good so I'm glad I have a small woofer system to connect. The sound is fine with headphones.The other thing that is taking time to get used to is the touch pad being offset to the left, on my old one it was central.
customer_reviews.author: Miss A.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Delivery prompt and efficient as usual. I am still getting used to the laptop but it certainly meets all my needs and more. I have been deleting lots of pre-loaded programmes and fumbling around Windows 8.1 - took the advice of one of your reviewers and downloaded classic shell so that I could have my start menu back and could find things more easily. I do not like Windows 8.1 and can't see why the big change. Still early days to give more of a review.
customer_reviews.author: Swallow

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Such value for money, easy to set up and windows 8.1 is good, appears to be easier than windows 8. Battery life is incredible, it is light to carry. Just a good all rounder
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P. A. Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Window 8 is a let down.
customer_reviews.text: Well what can I say, This laptop is very well built, Intel inside no problem. It is also very much quicker than my last laptop. Start up is very much quicker, BUT the only reason that I have only given 3 stars is the most terrible Window system ever thought up!!! Windows 8.1.. As I have already said the laptop is very good.
customer_reviews.author: ET.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for studies, sound a slight let down.
customer_reviews.text: bought this laptop as a budget laptop for uni and it didn't disappoint, it's fast and smooth with good storage, my boyfriend plays League of Legends on it and he said it was great for his gaming. The only fault i felt was the speakers are not very loud even at their maximum level, so I would advise using external speakers if you want to listen to music or watch a movie. I also believe that windows 8 is only good if you have a touchscreen laptop, which this isn't. Also, i ordered it in red and it came in black,
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent buy and one recommended by IT technician. It has been invaluable for me for general use and a means for finding the different items I have required for my various projects.
customer_reviews.author: David Barker

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: It would get a better review if I could settle to the OS (Windows 8) It has a large screen with excellent definition and works as quickly as my broadband allows. It looks good, is lighter than I expected and gives me exactly what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: After a few tries I was disappointed. After realising its potential I am glad I ...
customer_reviews.text: After a few tries I was disappointed.After realising its potential I am glad I purchased it no complaints any more well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: baz

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This laptop's internet was slower than the 7 y/o laptop it was meant as a replacement for. I ended up returning it and buying an Asus one instead. Definitely wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carole & Clark

customer_reviews.title: what a great product, and value for money
customer_reviews.text: what a great product, and value for money, does all you need to do and more. Fast start up and can handle most things would recommend this
customer_reviews.author: ross

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great little notebook ( laptop) my old Acer of 4 years had slowed down considerably and this is just perfect. So easy to use. Great service arrived in France in 3 days from ordering.
customer_reviews.author: SUB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Its still going strong... Bought this over a year ago now and never had a problem ;)
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money half the price of a new ...
customer_reviews.text: well worth the money half the price of a new one it has one scratch on lid but dosenot affect the use of the computer
customer_reviews.author: melvin fish

customer_reviews.title: The laptop would have scored a five except for the ...
customer_reviews.text: The laptop would have scored a five except for the fact that it runs Windows 8 which I find to be very un-userfriendly!
customer_reviews.author: Ted MOONEY

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This replaced one that failed, but Amazon came up trumps with the refund, and this has worked reliably.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is first class! Easy to use! Key board a good size! Was delivered from Amazon on the date specified! Windows 8 is uncomplicated to use but extremely efficient! I've had so many problems with computers in the last few years its a wonder I not an alcoholic! This Acer laptop has bought normality to my life! I'm over the moon with it!
customer_reviews.author: Meg Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use good screen / good service with delivery came on time thanks
customer_reviews.author: mr p p donald

customer_reviews.title: Its a great laptop, however Ive noticed that randomly the left ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a great laptop, however Ive noticed that randomly the left click button stops working and it holds down onto the item, not sure if this is me or the product
customer_reviews.author: Mr. David N. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Mouse pad temperamental and windows 8 not my favourite, makes things work slow but ok for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Mouse pad temperamental and windows 8 not my favourite, makes things work slow but ok for the money, if you can stretch a bit more go for a higher spec.
customer_reviews.author: MR G ROBINSON

customer_reviews.title: Very good laptop, works fast and is perfect for day ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good laptop, works fast and is perfect for day to day use. Good colour and is very light which is good. The specs are good too,1000gb hard drive what more could u ask for. Would reccomend to everyone looking for a reliable laptop which is not too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Qasim

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product that seem to fit the need I purchaesd it for.
customer_reviews.author: Jello Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these laptops 17 months old both not working due to not charging one went back under warranty but today have been courier charges will be £47.99 for one laptop. Please beware.
customer_reviews.author: Francezy

customer_reviews.title: ... had this laptop for 5 months now an i love it, it came well packaged an very quick
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for 5 months now an i love it, it came well packaged an very quick. Would defiantly recommend this to anyone even thinking of buying another :)
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. Delivery was on time and the product is ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Delivery was on time and the product is Ace. It's been a pleasure to do business with a professional organisation such as yours. I will buy more products from you in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Gauhl

customer_reviews.title: Far too complicated for elder customers and little or no ...
customer_reviews.text: Far too complicated for elder customers and little or no WRITTEN operating advice. Some 75% over loaded for my own IT operating capability.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop, quick and easy to use. Hate Windows 8 roll on the roll out of Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Gargantuan dissappointment
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product I found that half the keys didn't work and ended up sending it back. Needless to say I am extremely disappointed and sorry I ever bought it.
customer_reviews.author: rob smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cheap feel
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Pretty cheap feel. Running Debian 7 on it for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bensley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The laptop I find to be good but I resent some of the pre-installed apps.
customer_reviews.author: Wladyslawo

customer_reviews.title: One rubbish laptop
customer_reviews.text: Total rubbIsh. Wouldn't even switch on so had to be returned. Do not touch with a barge pole!!
customer_reviews.author: David Parr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses it for her photograpy.Works well and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: R. Loadman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but battery don't hold the charge for long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Wood

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Acer
customer_reviews.text: This is to replace my previous Acer which has given me good service until I dropped it on the floor and caused terminal damage everything is as I expect from acer a nice fast machine that looks and feels the part,the reason I did not give it 5 star is the reason many people criticise is the windows 8 I hate it and am finding its seriously affecting my enjoyment I wish I had found a windows 7 machine.
customer_reviews.author: wozza

customer_reviews.title: A Good family laptop
customer_reviews.text: A very good laptop with good performance for daily use. Not tried muc of gaming in it. Windows 8 a bit of a let down. Not suitable to laptops. disabled a few features and added a start button. Working good now.
customer_reviews.author: venkatesh

customer_reviews.title: Like the lap top but cant get my head round windows 8
customer_reviews.text: The lap top is great but I am struggling with windows 8. It would also be nice to have windows office pre installed.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Vast improvement on previous laptops
customer_reviews.text: Our previous Toshiba laptops were dated, slow and past their use by dates. This new one is streamlined, easy to use and causes far less stress.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Dredge

customer_reviews.title: Really good laptop - But!
customer_reviews.text: The computer itself is something of a bargain - but the operating system is hard work and the crap-ware is all over the place like a virus.
customer_reviews.author: R.K.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews before buying. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs G.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed in this product and non-userfriendly support
customer_reviews.text: Problematic laptop, has been an issue since 1 month after purchase. Has been returned to Acer for repair, yet still suffering numerous faults. Telephone support has been to no avail. Now cannot get contact to speak with to get replacement. No point advising online support as unit doesn't work so cannot go online. Need telephone number to speak directly to Acer or Amazon. Extremely disappointed in this product and non-userfriendly support. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gramps

customer_reviews.title: Good workhorse
customer_reviews.text: It was bought for our church music and it does the job we want it to do. Windows 7 would have served us better!
customer_reviews.author: jon-karl

customer_reviews.title: Good family computer
customer_reviews.text: This computer was relatively easy to set up and use. The DVD drive and 15.6 ins screen make it suitable for watching DVds
customer_reviews.author: karen bell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price and I have found Windows 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price and I have found Windows 8 to be very functional and straight forward in use and can't understand all the gripes about it in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie Otter

customer_reviews.title: found laptop easy to use
customer_reviews.text: found laptop easy to use .. but found to many products on laptop that I would never want on witched keeps popping up like Norton backup. acre has its own backup so why put Norton on laptop. apart from that found laptop nice to use
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price (around £340), this is not a bad lap top. A couple of things have proved annoying with use, however, & I don't think I'd recommend it very highly. Annoyances: - mousepad is over reactive, often selecting items without me left clicking on them. -sound quality: tinny and not very pleasant. - Windows 8: not the fault of the laptop but really, seriously NOT an improvement on windows 7!! Good stuff: - reliable connectivity: even my erratic router hasn't managed to interrupt me yet! - feels light & looks sleek - good memory size
customer_reviews.author: ruth everett

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it did not come in red it came in grey, my only complaint
customer_reviews.author: Black Rose

customer_reviews.title: Ruined by Microsoft.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this laptop is any good or not. The problem is that Windows 8.1 prevents me using its features in the way I want to. I am bombarded by pop-ups, despite having the pop-up blocker on, and navigating to anywhere means making numerous attempts before I get where i want to go instead of to some garbage website trying to sell me some crap I don't want and interfering with what I'm doing. I am hating this so much that I am tempted to throw the thing in a cupboard and forget it. Congratulations Microsoft. You made an enemy here. Hope you're pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Hoad

customer_reviews.title: excellent machine
customer_reviews.text: this is the third ACER laptop in our small family, and each gets better than the last. Windows 8.1 takes a bit of getting used to but I am slowly getting the hang of it. The laptop is quite powerful and fast enough for everyday use and has given no trouble whatsoever. Recommended without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goacher

customer_reviews.title: General Consumer laptop
customer_reviews.text: Things you need to know is that its non ips screen meaning a bad viewing angles, slightly over priced at time writing for what you get i.e. (dumbed down processor) and red coloured. Who is this product for, well non pc geeks or for the less educated on pc than others. However great for those types of people, just like who i got this product for.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this only a couple of weeks ago and up to now I am very pleased with my new laptop. While this version of windows is new to me and I am still learning I think it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Linda James

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this opening to have a nice red laptop but got a sliver laptop instead as ...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful, I ordered this opening to have a nice red laptop but got a sliver laptop instead as they longer have the red one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate the operating system. If there was anything less intuitive it would be difficult to design it.
customer_reviews.author: curriema

product_meta.title: Acer Aspire E1-570 15.6-inch Laptop (Iron) - (Intel Core i3 1.8GHz, 6GB RAM, 750GB HDD, DVDSM DL, LAN, WLAN, Webcam, Integrated Graphics, Windows 8.1)
product_meta.description:
ACER ASPIRE E1 SERIES -- DAILY COMPUTING WITH EASE
The Acer Aspire E1 series is all about delivering time-tested technologies you desire for productivity, entertainment and communication. The Aspire E1 Series delivers an excellent and affordable mobile PC experience. Solid performance, handy multimedia tools, and convenient connectivity make daily computing a pleasure.

SOLID PERFORMANCE
FAST PROCESSING WITH INTEL PENTIUM AND CORE PROCESSORS
The Acer Aspire E1 laptops feature a choice of processors to suit your power needs. Choose from a dual-core Intel Pentium processor for efficient home computing, or an Intel Core i5/i7, delivering intelligent performance that adapts to your individual needs. The 3rd generation Intel Core processors deliver great media processing for fast video editing and sharing, enthusiast class HD video playback, accelerated web browsing, and great mainstream and casual gaming experience.

LARGE CAPACITY STORAGE OPTIONS
The Acer Aspire E1 feature large capacity HDDs to allow you to keep all of your favourite applications and media to hand. On selected models, you'll find a 750GB HDD installed, allowing you to keep a large library of music and videos to take with you wherever you go.

MULTI-IN-1 CARD READER
The multi-in-one card reader allows you to read and write to high-capacity storage media for file sharing, transfer and storage, including Secure Digital (SD), MultiMediaCard (MMC), Memory Stick PRO (MS PRO), and xD-Picture Card (xD) formats, making it easier to transfer and share media from your PC to your portable devices.

ENJOYABLE MEDIA
ACER CINECRYSTAL HD LED-BACKLIT LCD
The Acer Aspire E1 comes with a slim and stunning Acer CineCrystal HD LCD display, with LED-backlit technology to enable the display to consume less power. The 15.6" HD screen flaunts 720p visuals in true HDTV 16:9 cinematic format.

HDMI-OUT PORT
If you need a bigger screen, the HDMI interface supports exceptional high-definition viewing on a full range of peripherals. Ideal for connecting to a big-screen HDTV, plugging a HDMI cable into your laptop allows the transmission of both audio and high-definition video, up to a 1080p resolution. 

The Acer Aspire E1 series also comes with 1 USB 3.0 port and 2 USB 2.0 ports. USB 3.0 is backwards compatible and runs up to 10x times faster than USB 2.0

M-DISC READY DRIVE
Whether you’re a SMB owner, a parent, a photographer, or all of the above, you can’t afford to lose your priceless memories or data. The Acer Aspire E1 series comes with a M-Drive Ready Disc, which is capable of storing data into the M-DISC to provide permanent storage. M-DISC Ready Drives save what you value for up to 1,000 years and offer up to 4.7GB of recordable permanent storage.*
**Only 14” and 15.6” laptops from Aspire E1 series are shipped with M-DISC Ready Drive. No M-DISC media and no third-party DVD burning software are shipped with the product. 

ACER CRYSTAL EYE HD WEBCAM WITH BUILT-IN MICROPHONE
The integrated high-performance HD webcam and built-in microphone offer optimal video capture and sound clarity for engaging in high resolution face-to-face communication.



BOX CONTAINS
Aspire laptop
Battery
AC Adapter
User Documentation/Media

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars93 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
